title: Monsoon (2015)
overview: Monsoon is a Bollywood film Produced by Mahendra Dhariwal & Jitender Gulati and Directed by Suzad Iqbal Khan. The film stars Srishti Sharma, Sudhanshu, Shawar Ali, Vijay Singh and Raja Gulati. The film release on February 20, 2015. The story of this film is loosely based on an Italian romantic drama film Malèna.
storyline: The movie revolves around the story of a 15 year old guy who falls in love with a 28 year old lady. The lady is now a widow as her husband who was a forest officer died while he was on duty. How the 15 year old boy falls for this lady and how he protects her from the society forms the rest of the story.
plot: It is a story of coming of age of a teen, a 15 yr old boy falls in love with a 28 yr old married woman, whose husband (a forest officer) dies while he is on duty. The boy starts to lust for the girl, besides also developing a feeling of love for her. But the evils of the society don't want the girl to live respectfully. The film revolves around the dreams and fantasies of the teen and the way he protects the woman from the evil society.
